title:
Turkey Meatballs with Parsley and Lemon
ACTIVE TIME
10m
TOTAL TIME
25m
4 servings
directions: In a large deep skillet or shallow saucepan bring the marinara sauce to a simmer over medium heat.
In a bowl combine turkey, Romano cheese, breadcrumbs, scallion, egg, half the parsley, 1 1/2 teaspoons of the lemon peel and the salt. With dampened hands form the mixture into 20 golf-size balls.
Add meatballs to marinara sauce and simmer, covered, 12 to 15 minutes, or until cooked through.
In a bowl combine the remaining parsley and the lemon peel. Sprinkle over meatballs.
Serve meatballs over premade polenta, if desired. Accompany with additional Romano cheese.
